title.rendered: How to purchase TAPS Tokens + Bonus

content.rendered:
tapswap (TAPS) Tokens are only available from the official tapswap.org dashboard.  Please create a profile at buy.tapswap.org or join through the any buy / sign-up link on our home.tapswap.org main page.

Continue and sign-up, remember to verify your email address and add your ethereum wallet ID.  You can also set up 2nd Factor authentication (we highly suggest this).  

This is the pricing for the 3 rounds and the bonus % you can receive for 1 ETH or more on the first 2 rounds.

  Start Finish USD Bonus Requirement for bonus
Presale Round 1 21/12/20 20/01/21 $0.10 15% 1 ETH
Presale Round 2 21/01/21 20/03/21 $0.20 10% 1 ETH
Main Sale Round 3 21/03/21 20/05/21 $0.40 5%
